==Best Travel Deals in Town==
YESSSA! We partnered up with TravelBird in order to bring you the greatest travel deals also directly into your personal travel guide.

WHAT exactly are travel deals?
- Well, that differs from deal to deal but a classic package might look like this —> “Romantic Weekend in Paris: Flights + 3 nights in 4* Hotel as well as romantic dinner and skip-the-line tickt for Eiffeltower for 2 Persons from € 199” (Just same made up offer but you get the idea).

WHY would that be interesting for you?
- If you’re using tripwolf to get inspired for your next trip, you can now as well check for awesome travel packages and book right away if you find something you don’t want to miss out
- Also, if you’re using the tripwolf app mainly to plan for your next trip but haven’t booked anything yet, you can now use the travel deal sections to catch up with that or maybe just to get a better understanding of what the city has to offer and what the prices look like

ERR but what if you already booked everything and just need tripwolf to be a travel guide app like it’s supposed to be?
- That’s no problem at all :) We're also currently working on enabling an option for you, so that you can deactivate all kinds of additional booking options (Tours, hotels, …) so you can focus on what matters most for you!

==100 NEW TRAVEL DESTINATIONS==
Spring is here! And we’re bringing you an update full with new spring getaway destinations from our premium content partners MARCO POLO and Fodor’s. Here’s what’s new:
- 100 new destinations (in English, German, French, Italian and Spanish)
- focused around spring getaways
- perfect to for a 3-5 days trip during Easter holidays and spring break

Try it out and let us know what you think! We’re always trying super hard to bring you the very best travel experience directly to your mobile device. Like it? Let us know in a review! Questions? Just shoot us a quick email to our support and we’ll take care of it asap!

==SYNC YOUR TRIPS==
You have more than one device? Starting now, you can sync all of your purchases and TRIPS (!), even between different platforms. Here’s how you can use it:
- Plan your trip from your tablet at home, then sync your personalized trip with your phone and take it with you on your trip
- Add sights and to-do’s to your trip and let the person you’re travelling with get access to your trip so you don’t have to plan your trip twice!

Try it out and let us know what you think! We’re always trying super hard to bring you the very best travel experience directly to your mobile device. Like it? Let us know in a review! Questions? Just shoot us a quick email to our support and we’ll take care of it asap!

== JOIN THE SUMMER TRAVEL SEASON! ==
- New summer destinations added
- Improved routing (from A to B) function
- Added public transportation (metro, bus, …) to the map
- Smoother on-boarding experience to the app

== NEW DESTINATIONS ==
Start planning your trip for plenty of new summer destinations like Palma de Mallorca, Côte d’Azur or Sharm El Sheikh.

== BETTER ROUTING INSIDE THE MAP ==
You asked, we delivered!
- Set your “from” point anywhere on the map to make planning your route even easier
- You can either navigate from your current location or from any point you choose in the map

== PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION ON THE MAP ==
- Public transportation (metro, bus, …) was a bit hidden on the map, we’ll now show you these by default
- You can always hide the public transportation POIs if you want to

== BETTER ON-BOARDING EXPERIENCE ==
The app has a lot of content and features to offer and sometimes it can be simply too much, especially right at the very beginning of using it.
Thus, we decided to add (and remove) a little guidance in the app in order to help you getting the most out of your travel experience.

As always, our updates are almost exclusively built on the feedback we receive from all you travellers. If you like the app, we’ll always and forever be grateful for a lovely review in the App Store. Should you run into troubles or have a question or two, please write us to support@tripwolf.com and we’ll take care of it real quick.

== OFFLINE NAVIGATION UPDATE ==
We’re super happy to introduce a huge improvement to our map navigation feature. Previously, you’d be able to only navigate from your current position to wherever you wish. With the new version, you can now set the “locate from” location to any position of your choice. That should make it way easier to plan your routes ahead from home, the hotel or while waiting for the bus for your upcoming trip.

== BOOK YOUR FLIGHT ON THE GO ==
In addition to our routing improvements, we now also added flight booking directly into our travel guides. Depending on where you currently are in your travel planning phase, you can now book flights for your upcoming destination, look for hotels or check out tours and activities right from within the app.

You have questions about the newest feature additions? Just shoot us an email to support@tripwolf.com and we’ll get back to you asap. If you’re happy with the new version, please leave a quick review in the app store and help us keep doing what we do and love!

=== FALL UPDATE ===
*Way improved usability for visually impaired travellers
- With this updated we’re bringing massive improvements to our VoiceOver feature in order to plan ahead for your upcoming in a better way.

*Better overview of all tripwolf products
- We’re continuously extending our offerings of different destination guides and packages. Over time, this can get quite overwhelming and sometimes hard to follow. We’ve now added an improved overview for all products.

We’re gladly inviting you to test the new update and let us know what you think with a nice little review in the app store :) If you have any questions, please let us know at support@tripwolf.com

== NEW UPDATE FOR MAPS! ==
We’ve been tussling with this update for quite some time now. That’s why we’re so incredibly excited to present this enormous update, which includes countless improvements to tripwolf maps. Read more here to see what’s new:

## New filter options ##
(+) A completely new overhaul of filter options
(+) Both on the maps themselves as well as in the individual chapters
(+) Sort quickly and easily according to the most important categories (attractions, restaurants, …) and find what you’re really interested in
(+) Filter for additional information like ATM’s, public restrooms, free Wi-Fi, etc. near you
(+) Filter for your currently created trips and only view locations on the map that are stored in your personal trip planner (now also for iPad!)

## New map searches ##
(+) Search quickly and easily for a specific address on the map, even without internet connection
(+) Also find the most important sights and attractions on the street you’ve searched
(+) How does it work? Search for an address such as “1681 Broadway” in New York, and in addition to the exact address on the map, you’ll also find all of the most important attractions in the neighborhood (or with a similar name)

We hope you enjoy our new map updates, and of course we appreciate every review in the App Store. If you have questions or feedback, reach out to us anytime at support@tripwolf.com!

### BUG FIX: OFFLINE MAPS ###
This update brings an urgent fix to a bug which resulted in (offline) maps sometimes not properly displaying the correct street names. Thank you very much for your quick feedback which allowed us to act swiftly and publish this bug fix release.

IMPORANT: In order to ensure that you’re maps are working again, we’d like to ask you to please update your maps inside the app by following these steps:
(1) In a guide, tap ‘download’ icon on the upper right corner
(2) For ‘map download’ tap the ‘download’ button
(3) Enjoy your trip!

This update brings some super exciting news with a new language supported and plenty little performance improvements! Read below for more details:
- Russian language support: Starting today, not only will the app be available completely in Russian but we're also introducing more than 100 new travel guides in Russian.
- Faster, better, stronger loading: The tripwolf app has become faster than ever and will load sights and pictures much quicker than before.
- Explore the world (without internet): Offline availability has long been an super important feature of ours, however, we heard from you guys that this feature is sometimes way too hidden. We're now introducing a more prominent offline download indicator to make sure you'll find what you're looking for!

There’s more cool stuff to come, we promise! If you like this update, then please take a minute or two for a quick review on the app store. It would mean the world to us and helps us keep doing what we love :) Thank you!

Hooray, the new Trip Planner is here!

For months we’ve been collecting your suggestions, discussing them in detail, making a plan, putting it into action, and today we’re very happy to introduce you to the new Trip Planner!

Now, it’s not just possible to collect your favorite points of interest, restaurants and museums and display them on the map – Trip Planner can do soooo much more. Features include:

- Automatic sorting of POIs by distance
- Splitting your trips into days, to make your plans easier to see
- View your route for the day on the map
- Enter your accommodation and point of departure (POI or desired address)
- Enter multiple POIs at once – with just one click!
- Start and end dates for your trip, to help you keep an overview

If you have feedback or other suggestions, we would love to hear from you anytime at support@tripwolf.com. Thank you for using tripwolf and making it possible for us to keep working on our App.

Happy planning!

In this update, we primarily fixed some bugs for iOS 11, as well as the ability to save your last position on the map, even if the app has already been pushed to the background. Previously, this caused a complete restart of the map, in particular on heavily-used devices.

Are you happy with the new update? We always look forward to your ratings in the App Store! If you have questions, we’d love to hear from you anytime at support@tripwolf.com.

This is our final update for 2017! That's why we thought we give out a little gift to some of you and finally optimized the app for all iPad Pro models. Now, the app is optimized for all iOS devices (including iPhone X) and Apple can think of something new. Yay! :) Additionally, we added the possibility to change the email address in your user account.

Thank you for using the app this year, we really hope you continue to do so! Merry Christmas & a happy new year from us. See you in 2018! :)

This update contains a bunch of new functionalities, design changes and bug fixes! In detail:
- Flexible screen layout for all iPad models
- Button for date picker on iPad is fully visible again
- iPad street search works in offline mode reliably 
- Photo preview is available in all screen sizes for iPhones
- Preview guides get automatically upgraded after you purchase Unlimited
- Reporting of outdated content is available in online mode only
- Fix for iPhone X, XR and XS when upgrading the map version — the button is fully visible again

You enjoy this update? We’d love to see your positive review in the App Store! If you have any questions or problems regarding the app, please send us a message to support@tripwolf.com anytime.

You asked for it and we delivered: From now on, you'll be able to upload your own pictures to tripwolf! Whether a place already has tons of pictures or not a single one, you'll be allowed to add your favorite photo, too. Share your best shots with the tripwolf community now and help to make each travel guide even more special!

We're always working on improvements to the app, and we look forward to (nice) reviews in the App Store! If you have questions about the update, get in touch with us at support@tripwolf.com. Thanks for traveling with tripwolf!

** Huge privacy update & new map versions! **

The update contains new map versions for all destinations, but also big adaptions regarding the General Data Protection Regulation! Being transparent with the usage of your data is very important to us, that's why we included new privacy settings in the sidebar of the app. Here you can find an overview of all services tripwolf uses, which data we collect and why. If you have any questions regarding this update, please drop us an e-mail anytime (support@tripwolf.com).

Huge update for our new Audio Phrasebooks! You are in a foreign city and search for the nearest subway or you want to go to the beach, but forgot your sunscreen? We help you communicating with the locals. With this update, we doubled the content of our phrasebook to approximately 160 phrases in 10 chapters and for over 15 languages - audio playback included! Two of the chapters can be tested for free, others are available for a launch price for a limited time.

Additional bug fixes:

- Offline map will *always* be used when available: as soon as an offline map was downloaded, the app will no longer try to load the online map, even if you have a connection
- If you enabled the location tracking and set it to "While app is being used", the app will no longer try to save your position and therefore the blue iOS banner will no longer be shown after putting the app into the background. After opening up the app later, it may take a couple of seconds until your position is visible on the map again.

You are happy with our latest update? We'd love to hear from you! Send us an email with feedback to support@tripwolf.com or leave us a positive review in the App Store. We're always working hard to bring new functionalities and new content to our app!

In this update, we included two completely new features, which we dedicated the whole of last week to. We call this ‘tripwolf power week’ :) Let us introduce you to:

— tripwolf Shortcuts: Use 3D touch (tap on the app icon and add a little pressure!) to access a little side menu. Here you can open your last used travel guide, a trip or the map with just one action! Super helpful, especially if you’re in a hurry. This feature is available from iPhone 6S/6S Plus onwards.

— The tripwolf Travel Quiz for iPhone: We included our first game in over 80 travel guides! You can now find out how good you really know a city. We show you photos of sights, divided into three different difficulty levels (be quick!) and you have to guess what is pictured. Can you guess all of them? Also available offline! 

Stay tuned for more updates over the next few weeks! If you have any feedback, please let us know via support@tripwolf.com. Have fun!

The second tripwolf Summer Update is here! And we packed two amazing new functionalities into this one:

1. Google Maps
You can now not only open your point of interest on our map but also directly via Google Maps. This means, that you can now also use public transportation for routing! Additionally, we also added the support for trips: Open your trip on Google Maps and start the turn-by-turn navigation right away.

2. The new Welcome Screen
Have everything right at your disposal! The Welcome screen now contains not only your user profile with your latest guides and trips, but also an overview of all of your purchases and synchronized devices. Yay!

We can't wait to hear what you think! Send us all your questions and feedback to support@tripwolf.com and we'll get back to you asap. Have fun!

This is a bug fix release. It fixes the following three bugs:

- When a POI is no longer available but part of a trip, the app crashed. 
- For Spanish only: Opening a trip made the app crash because a placeholder in the tour integration was not set up properly.
- App showed "0 more recommendations" as part of the tour integration. This will no longer be shown.

We are already working on new things, so stay tuned!

This update contains the following:

* Phrasebook search: You can now use the search inside your Phrasebook to find the phrase you are looking for within seconds!  Just type in a keyword and we'll show you all relevant results. Please update your travel guide first in order to use the search.
* Update for all maps: This update contains the latest version of our maps, including new streets, street names etc.

You like the update? Please leave us a review, we'd love to hear your feedback! In case you have any questions or problems, please contact our customer support via support@tripwolf.com and we'll get back to you asap!

This update contains a bunch of new functionalities, design changes and bug fixes! In detail:

- Flexible screen layout for all iPad models
- Button for date picker on iPad is fully visible again
- iPad street search works in offline mode reliably 
- Photo preview is available in all screen sizes for iPhones
- Preview guides get automatically upgraded after you purchase Unlimited
- Reporting of outdated content is available in online mode only
- Fix for iPhone X, XR and XS when upgrading the map version — the button is fully visible again

You enjoy this update? We’d love to see your positive review in the App Store! If you have any questions or problems regarding the app, please send us a message to support@tripwolf.com anytime.
